name: TOOTH (FranSass)
description:
Welcome To T O O T H

Ward off cavities and invasive popcorn kernels! Made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Mundane Game Jam.

Controls

Run: A/Left Arrow and D/Right Arrow

Fly: Hold W or Up Arrow

Brush current tooth: Hold S or Down Arrow

Destroy kernel: Stand on edge and click Left Mouse Button

Menu: Escape key

For the downloadable version, unzip all files into one folder and run the Mundane Game Jam application.

Enjoy!!
